Package net.silthus.schat.message

package net.silthus.schat.message
Contains the API for the Message and everything that is encapsulated by the message.
  • Class
    Description
    Message
     
    Message.Draft
     
    Message.Type
     
    Messages
    A container for messages that can be used to store and persist messages in memory.
    MessageSource
    A message source can be anything that is Identified and used to send messages.
    MessageTarget
    Represents an object that can receive messages.
    Targets
    A container for targets that can be used to combine and filter multiple targets into one target.
    TargetsFilter
